eto-dashboard-application-description: Your ETO application can filled out in stages, saved, skipped and edited at any point until every stage is 100% and your application is submitted. Once  submitted X can be edited and you can always update media links and marketing info, The information from these forms complies to fill out your ETO page and set your Smart Contract Terms

investment-flow.amount-exceeds-investmen: Due to transaction costs this amount exceeds your invertment limit.
investment-flow.amount-to-invest: Amount you would like to  invest
investment-flow.bank-transfer-info-messa: For the Firth Force ETO you are able to invest via direct bank transfer. Transfers take 1-2 to be confirmed and only then will tokens be issued. If the transfer is not confirmed before the end of the sale your money will be returned to your bank account in 1-2 days.
investment-flow.bank-transfer-summary.ex: You will recieve an email with the below investment summary, if your investment is successful you will recieve another email in 2-3 days confirming your investment.
investment-flow.bank-transfer.bank-detai: Funds must be transferred from a bank account matching the verified users name and country of this account and including your reference number. If the below does not match the sending bank account your funds will be returned and no tokens will be issued.
investment-flow.bank-transfer.gas-stipen: I Agree to add 10 EUR to investment amount that will be converted into ETH gas stipend for future transactions on the platform.
investment-flow.bank-transfer.general-in: Investments via bank transfer take approx 2-3 to clear. Once investment is received we will send you an email confirmation and will issue your tokens to your account. If the investment is not recieved before the end of the sale your money will be returned to your bank account in 1-2 days.
investment-flow.error-message.above-maxi: Sorry the amount is above the maximum ticket size of {maxAmount}
investment-flow.error-message.below-mini: Sorry the amount is below the minimum ticket size of {minAmount}
investment-flow.error-message.exceeds-to: Sorry the amount exceeds the amount of {tokenName} Tokens left in the sale, please reduce the investment
investment-flow.error-message.exceeds-wa: Sorry the amount exceeds your wallet balance
investment-flow.error-message.not-enough: Sorry your wallet does not contain enought ether to cover gas for the transaction
investment-flow.success.congratulation-t: Congratulations your investment transaction has been confirmed you can view your transaction on {etherscan}. We will notify you when you can claim your Equity Tokens.
investment-flow.success.title: Investment confirmed
investment-flow.summary.transaction-cost: transaction cost (gas price x gas limit)
kyc.business.beneficial-owner.beneficial: Are there any beneficial owners of this company? Someone qualifies as such if they hold more than 25% of a company's shares. If there is a beneficial owner, please fill in the following details.
kyc.business.beneficial-owner.label: Beneficial Owner {id}
kyc.business.business-data.description: Please fill in the following information to verify your company.
kyc.business.legal-representative.descri: Please fill in the following information to verify your identity.
kyc.disclaimer.contents:
The following information will be used to verify your identity in compliance with European Know Your Client and Anti Money Laundering policies.

Your information is always kept confidential and needs to be stored for at least 5 years.

By providing your information and clicking “Continue” you are consenting to your data being processed.
kyc.disclaimer.header: Why do we need this information?
kyc.modal.submit-description: Confirm submitting your Verification Process request
kyc.modal.verification.description: Thank you for completing your identity verification process, our team will check your application and will communicate with you within 1 day. To contact support please click here, to continue deposit click here.
kyc.modal.verification.title: Verification process is completed
kyc.personal.high-income: Is your income above 5.000 EUR monthly, or do you have more than 100.000 EUR of assets available?
kyc.personal.income.disclaimer: The German Federal Financial Supervisory Authority requires us to ensure that our clients invest within their means
kyc.personal.instant-id.description: Instant Verification: You will be redirected to our verification partner IDNow in order to complete a fast video verification via your computer or mobile camera. After the successful verification, you can invest and deposit funds on the Neufund Platform instantly.
kyc.personal.instant-id.manual-verificat: Manual Verification: If you do not wish to get instantly verified you can also choose the manual process. Therefore you have to fill out a form and upload your documents. The process may take up to 1 business day.
kyc.personal.politically-exposed.disclai: You will be asked to provide more details about your situation at a later stage.
kyc.personal.politically-exposed.questio: Are you a Politically Exposed Person?
kyc.personal.politically-exposed.tooltip:
You are a Politically Exposed Person (PEP) if:

  1. You hold a prominent position or have influence, thus you’re being more susceptible to be involved in bribery or corruption
  2. You are any close business associate or family member of the former.
kyc.personal.uploadId.description: Please upload a colored copy of your passport or both sides of your ID card for verification.
kyc.personal.us-citizen.disclaimer: Due to regulatory uncertainties in the US we can currently not accept any US American citizens. Since US law also operates outside of its geographical borders we cannot make an exception even if you are based overseas
kyc.personal.us-citizen.question: Are you a US citizen?

kyc.request-state.outsourced.title: Instant identification started
kyc.request-state.pending.description: We received your application and are currently processing it. You can submit additional documents upon request on this page.

modal.ipfs-eto.description: Ready to go? Once uploaded, your legal document is public and immutable which means you won’t be able to delete it. We use IPFS, a p2p distributed file system, that gives each document a unique hash and timestamp which we link to the smart contracts to make them legally binding.

wallet-selector.help-link.label: Help
wallet-selector.ledger-not-supported: Your browser does not support NeuKey. For security reasons we require a recent version of:
wallet-selector.ledger.start.browser-sup: Ensure you enable "Browser support" on your ledger
wallet-selector.ledger.start.step1.descr: Connect your Ledger Nano via USB and get your PIN code ready
wallet-selector.ledger.start.step2.descr: Use the left and right button to enter your PIN and press two keys at the same time to confirm
wallet-selector.ledger.start.step3.descr: Press the buttons to scroll through apps and choose Ethereum. Press two buttons at once to confirm
wallet-selector.ledger.start.step4.descr: Click once on right key and press 2 keys at the same time to enter Settings
wallet-selector.ledger.start.step5.descr: Click once on right key and press 2 keys at the same time to enter Browser support
wallet-selector.ledger.start.step6.descr: Choose Yes and press 2 keys at the same time to confirm choice
wallet-selector.light.icbm-info.message: The Light Wallet is a starter for those who are new to blockchain, but if you would like to invest more, we strongly suggest you register with a Ledger Nano. Are you an ICBM investor? Please create your account using the wallet with which you made your commitment. Otherwise continue to use Light Wallet, an in-browser wallet. Keep in mind that only you control this wallet which makes you fully responsible for its security, including your private key or phrase. Neufund never sees any private keys, nor signs and doesn’t execute any transactions. Neither do we provide recovery services.
wallet-selector.neuwallet.login-instruct: To login, please click on the Access Link you received after creating your Light Wallet
wallet-selector.neuwallet.login.prompt: Sign in to your Light Wallet.
wallet-selector.recover.help.email-login: Please check your inbox for the Access Link you got after creating your Light Wallet
wallet-selector.recover.help.password-fo: I don't remember my Light Wallet password
wallet-selector.recover.help.recover-wit: Recover your Light Wallet with your 24 words long recovery phrase to change your password
wallet-selector.recover.help.wallet-id-m: I can't find my wallet ID
wallet-selector.recover.seed.recover-des: Use the recovery phrase to recover your Light Wallet. Only then you can reset your password.
wallet-selector.recover.seed.register-de: Your wallet will be imported into a new neufund account
